boardgame.description: Not a trivia buff? It doesn't matter! In Wits _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Wagers, each player writes a guess to a question such as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;In what year did the bikini swimsuit makes its first appearance?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;How many feet wide is an NFL football field?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; and places it face-up on the betting mat. Think you know the answer? Bet on your guess. Think you know who the experts are? Bet on their guess. The closest answer--without going over--pays out according to the odds on the betting mat. Strike it big and you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll be cheering like you just hit the jackpot!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Wits _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Wagers is a trivia game that lets you bet on anyone_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s answer. So you can win by making educated guesses, by playing the odds, or by knowing the interests of your friends. It can be taught in 2 minutes, played in 25 minutes, and accommodates up to 20 people in teams._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

North Star Games (NSG 101) Trivia for people who don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know stuff... Not a trivia buff? It doesn’t matter! Each player writes a guess to a question such as “In what year did the bikini swimsuit makes its first appearance?” or “How many feet wide is an NFL football field?” and places it face-up on the betting mat. Think you know the answer? Bet on your guess. Think you know who the experts are? Bet on their guess. Strike it big and you’ll be cheering like you just hit the jackpot!

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 7 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: Preferred payment is PayPal, but will accept cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks or money orders. I DO NOT accept personal checks. If you choose to pay by cashier check or money order, please include item number. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.
